note: Board Game Designer, DIY Publisher, Big Biceps. Known for Drinking Quest, Cheese Factory, Master Dater, Newfoundland Jam, Your Friend is Sad, REAP + Others Had 100K followers on the bird site but was tired of billionaire grifters being the main character. Tweets are a mix of comedy and board game industry insights.
